name: Crocker Amazon Playground
description: Features: - Accessible Children's Play Area - Accessible Parking - Accessible Picnic Area - Accessible Restroom - Athletic Field - Baseball Diamond - Bocce - Community Garden - Outdoor Basketball Court - Parking - Pickleball (Outdoor) - Playground - Restrooms - Skate Park - Tennis Crocker Amazon is much more than a playground, it’s a sports complex. Five full-size, lighted soccer fields are available for year-round play, along with baseball and softball fields, tennis, basketball and bocce court
